verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

‘Anyone \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H7819"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w who|strong="H3478"\w* \w slaughters|strong="H7819"\w* \w an|strong="H7819"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3775"\w*, \w or|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w goat|strong="H5795"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H7819"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w or|strong="H1004"\w* \w outside|strong="H2351"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w it|strong="H7819"\w*

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w goat|strong="H8163"\w* \w demons|strong="H8163"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w which|strong="H1992"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w prostituted|strong="H2181"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w*. \w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w permanent|strong="H5769"\w* \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* \w for|strong="H2708"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w for|strong="H2708"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w*.’

Tell \w them|strong="H8432"\w* \w that|strong="H1616"\w* if anyone \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w or|strong="H4480"\w* \w any|strong="H4480"\w* \w foreigner|strong="H1616"\w* \w living|strong="H1481"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w them|strong="H8432"\w* \w offers|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w or|strong="H4480"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, ‘\w None|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w may|strong="H3478"\w* eat \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H3478"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w foreigner|strong="H1121"\w* \w living|strong="H5315"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* eat \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.’

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w any|strong="H4480"\w* \w Israelite|strong="H3478"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w foreigner|strong="H1121"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w them|strong="H8432"\w* \w hunts|strong="H6679"\w* \w down|strong="H6679"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wild \w animal|strong="H2416"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w bird|strong="H5775"\w* \w that|strong="H1616"\w* \w may|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* eaten, \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* drain \w its|strong="H3680"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* \w it|strong="H8432"\w* \w with|strong="H3680"\w* \w dirt|strong="H6083"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*. \w Therefore|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* told \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, ‘\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* eat \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w living|strong="H1320"\w* \w thing|strong="H5315"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*; \w whoever|strong="H3605"\w* eats \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w*.’

\w And|strong="H4325"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w person|strong="H5315"\w*, whether native \w or|strong="H5704"\w* \w foreigner|strong="H1616"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* eats \w anything|strong="H3605"\w* found \w dead|strong="H5315"\w* \w or|strong="H5704"\w* mauled \w by|strong="H5704"\w* wild \w beasts|strong="H2966"\w* \w must|strong="H5315"\w* \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* clothes \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w bathe|strong="H7364"\w* \w with|strong="H5315"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*; \w then|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*.
